The rates listed are for either "East of the Mississippi" or "West of the Mississippi" and include insurance coverage. Your actual costs can be viewed by clicking on "View Shipping Charges" in your cart. Bikes, Trainers, Wheels and other overweight items are billed at higher rates.

For International Shipping please call 1-631-673-2211 or e-mail us at: info@bicyclebuys.com

International orders are not billed at time of order. You will be contacted in advance with the most economical quotes we can find. For overseas shipments we use UPS, DHL, Federal Express and US Mail. The most economical rates will be quoted.

You will be notified before shipping of any changes and your approval.

Note: We are located in New York State. Most states east of the Mississippi are within 3 days delivery time of the UPS System. States west of the Mississippi are 4- 6 days delivery time. UPS delivers next day to most regions of the continental US. Some remote regions might not have next day available. In which case 2 Day service will still be billed at the Next Day Rate. We cannot be responsible for delivery delays by these carriers. Delivery times can be subject to weather and other factors not in their control.

Note: Oversized and overweight parcels may have a higher freight charge. You will be notified in advance of any change to the freight cost.

Note: Freight to Alaska and Hawaii have different rates. We will use US Mail, UPS Air service or DHL. DHL, UPS does not offer ground service to these locations.
